gw.plugin.invoice

Interface IInvoice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IInvoice
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    The IInvoice plugin provides hooks to customer logic that are related to Invoice.

    • Method Detail

      • getInvoiceFeeAmount

        MonetaryAmount getInvoiceFeeAmount(AccountInvoice invoice)
        The amount of the invoice fee associated with this account.
        Parameters:
        invoice - the associated invoice
        Returns:
        the amount of the fee. This can be used to override the fee amount set in the UI.

      • getPaymentReversalFeeChargeInfo

        ChargeReturnObject getPaymentReversalFeeChargeInfo(DirectBillMoneyRcvd directBillMoneyRcvd)
        ChargePattern and Amount must be returned on the ChargeReturnObject. The ChargePattern will indicate whether to charge the late fee to the account or to a specific policy. If charging it to a specific policy, specify the Owner and Payer on the ChargeReturnObject. The Owner and Payer must be compatible with the ChargePattern returned.
        Parameters:
        directBillMoneyRcvd - that is being reversed
        Returns:
        a ChargeReturnObject

      • getLateFeeAmount

        @Deprecated
MonetaryAmount getLateFeeAmount(Account acct)
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) - Use method getLateFeeCharge(gw.api.domain.delinquency.DelinquencyTarget) instead.
        The amount of the late fee associated with this account.
        Parameters:
        acct - the account associated with this late fee
        Returns:
        the amount of the fee. This can be used to override the fee amount set in the UI.

      • getLateFeeCharge

        ChargeReturnObject getLateFeeCharge(DelinquencyTarget delinquencyTarget)
        The amount of the late fee.
        Parameters:
        delinquencyTarget - the account or policy associated with this late fee
        Returns:
        the return object containing the amount of the fee, the charge pattern, and optionally the owner and payer.

      • getReinstatementFeeAmount

        MonetaryAmount getReinstatementFeeAmount(DelinquencyPlan plan,
                                       DelinquencyTarget target)
        The amount of the reinstatement fee associated with this account.
        Parameters:
        plan - the default delinquency plan to use
        target - the delinquency target (ie account or policy) associated with this reinstatement
        Returns:
        the amount of the fee. This can be used to override the fee amount set in the UI.

      • getInstallmentFeeAmount

        MonetaryAmount getInstallmentFeeAmount(PolicyPeriod policy,
                                     Invoice invoice)
        The amount of the installment fee associated with this policy.
        Parameters:
        policy - the Policy Period associated with this invoice item
        invoice - the invoice that the fee will be placed on.
        Returns:
        the amount of the fee. This can be used to override the fee amount set in the UI.

      • shouldHoldDirectBillInvoiceItem

        java.lang.Boolean shouldHoldDirectBillInvoiceItem(InvoiceItem invoiceItem)
        Plugin method used to determine if a given invoice item should be held. See CC-32138 for background - this logic has been pushed into a plugin since there is no clear way that it should work 100% of the time.

      • shouldCarryForwardInvoice

        java.lang.Boolean shouldCarryForwardInvoice(AccountInvoice invoice)
        Plugin method fired by InvoiceImpl.sendInvoice() that determines whether or not to carry forward an invoice. See CC-33838 for background - this logic has been pushed into a plugin since there is no clear way that it should work 100% of the time.

      • shouldAccountUnappliedFundsPayChargesOnPolicies

        @Deprecated
java.lang.Boolean shouldAccountUnappliedFundsPayChargesOnPolicies()
        Deprecated. This method is never used
        Decide whether to pay charges from defaultdefault unapplied on invoice billed
        Returns:
        true if account unapplied will be used to pay charges on invoice billed

      • getPaidStatus

        InvoicePaidStatus getPaidStatus(Invoice invoice)
        Determine what is displayed on the Invoices screen in the Paid Status column, or what is returned by the Invoice.getPaidStatus() method for integration.
        Returns:
        InvoicePaidStatus typekey calculated from Amount, PaidAmount or other fields on Invoice.

      • getOutstandingAmount

        MonetaryAmount getOutstandingAmount(AccountInvoice invoice)
        Populates the Invoice.OutstandingAmount field at the point that the invoice is billed. This field is immutable, and is only populated via this plugin method.

      • getRemainingBalance

        MonetaryAmount getRemainingBalance(AccountInvoice invoice)
        Populates the Invoice.RemainingBalance field at the point that the invoice is billed. This field is immutable, and is only populated via this plugin method.

      • getUnappliedAmount

        MonetaryAmount getUnappliedAmount(AccountInvoice invoice)
        Populates the Invoice.UnappliedAmount field at the point that the invoice is billed. This field is immutable, and is only populated via this plugin method

      • getCollateralOutstandingAmount

        MonetaryAmount getCollateralOutstandingAmount(AccountInvoice invoice)
        Populates the Invoice.ColOutstandingAmount field at the point that the invoice is billed. This field is immutable, and is only populated via this plugin method.

      • getCollateralRemainingBalance

        MonetaryAmount getCollateralRemainingBalance(AccountInvoice invoice)
        Populates the Invoice.ColRemainingBalance field at the point that the invoice is billed. This field is immutable, and is only populated via this plugin method.

      • getCollateralUnappliedAmount

        MonetaryAmount getCollateralUnappliedAmount(AccountInvoice invoice)
        Populates the Invoice.ColUnappliedAmount field at the point that the invoice is billed. This field is immutable, and is only populated via this plugin method.

      • setPolicyPeriodInvoiceSnapshot

        void setPolicyPeriodInvoiceSnapshot(AccountInvoicePolicyPeriodSnapshot snapshot)
        Populates the invoice's policies' snapshot fields at the point that the invoice is billed. This fields are immutable, and is only populated via this plugin method. This method is called after Invoice.payChargesOnAssociatedTAccountOwners() is called, so all balance data takes into account charges paid right before the invoice is sent.

      • shouldCreatePaymentRequest

        boolean shouldCreatePaymentRequest(AccountInvoice invoice)
        Parameters:
        invoice -
        Returns:
        Whether or not to create a payment request

      • shouldMakeInvoiceItemsDueBeforePaying

        java.util.List<InvoiceItem> shouldMakeInvoiceItemsDueBeforePaying(java.lang.Iterable<BaseDistItem> paymentItems)
        Plugin call to determine whether or not we should push the invoice items being paid through to "Due" before paying it. Invoice Items returned from this plugin (if they are not already due) will be removed from the Invoice they are currently on, and place on a new ad hoc Invoice (Bill and Due date today), and then immediately made billed and due. NOTE: we will *not* move any Agency Bill invoice items.
        Parameters:
        paymentItems - The payment items about to be executed
        Returns:
        A list of all Invoice Items that we should make billed and due before completing the execution of this payment
